summary: A masked criminal who dresses like a giant bat terrorizes the guests at an old house rented by a mystery writer.
cast: George Beranger|Charles Herzinger|Emily Fitzroy|Louise Fazenda|Arthur Housman|Robert McKim|Jack Pickford|Jewel Carmen|Sôjin Kamiyama|Tullio Carminati|Eddie Gribbon|Lee Shumway|Stanton Heck
title: El murciélago
